answers.answer: Glad you're ok and hope they're able to find out what happened...saw your status the other day and was a little concerned!!Sometimes Docs just never find the cause for some things tho, I have previously had tests for anemia and diabetes for diziness with sweats and blurred vision (which strangely enough I had today for the first time in 10 ish years) and they never found the true cause!I really hope they're able to pin it down with you though and that you dont have it re-occur!Take care of yourself and bubba!! ;-)
So sorry to hear you have been sick.  Please rest and take care.  We are all here for you.
Rest up Lady!!!  I hope you don't have any more of those experiences and feel better soon!

Thank you ladies for you kind words. I hope i dont have this happen again as well. Ive been taking it easy although i did manage to put laundry away and clean the bathroom today. I was just told to snack as often as i like to keep my blood sugar up.

question: I just want to say im sorry to each and everyone of you for not being on as much the last few days. As i was not feeling well at all on wednesday which landed me in the ER that night. All afternoon i had a bad headache, felt lightheaded, passing out feeling, and hot/cold flashes. They kept me for 10hrs to monitor me and my levels because upon arriving my blood pressure was 147/88 and blood sugar was only 84! My blood sugar worry was because that was after a heavy snack. I got pain meds, blood work, urine test, and a CAT scan. Which everything came back normal so no real answers as to why i felt so bad. Now all i can do is rest, take it easy, and wait for my doctor appointment next friday.I also would like to thank all you ladies for being so wonderful and keeping the chat alive here.
title: Hi ladies...Sorry i have been MIA for the last few days!!!
